statements: SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, contact_number FROM customer_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE payment_history->>'total_payments' >= '1000';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_information;
SELECT * FROM customer_information WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_information ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customer_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, payment_history FROM customer_information WHERE JSONB_EXISTS(payment_history, 'payment_date');
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, payment_date FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM customers c JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY first_name, customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.amount, p.payment_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN payments p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 500;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.total_debt FROM customers c LEFT JOIN debt d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT contact_id, customer_id, contact_type, contact_info FROM CustomerContacts LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount FROM CustomerInformation JOIN PaymentHistory ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = PaymentHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, contact_info FROM CustomerInformation JOIN CustomerContacts ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = CustomerContacts.customer_id WHERE CustomerContacts.contact_type = 'email';
SELECT customer_name, reason FROM CustomerInformation JOIN DebtCollection ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = DebtCollection.customer_id ORDER BY DebtCollection.collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, debt_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN debts ON customers.customer_id = debts.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM addresses INNER JOIN customers ON addresses.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM debts ORDER BY debt_due_date DESC;
